body: I think Nexus is not as popular is at used to be because of the 15 player limit. I think it should be removed because if there is only a bit of people on they can't play Nexus because of the limit. As a Nexus person i strongly think it should be removed.
body_tagged: I think Nexus is not as popular is at used to be because of the 15 player limit. I think it should be removed because if there is only a bit of people on they can't play Nexus because of the limit. As a Nexus person i strongly think it should be removed.
title: Remove 15 player limit in Nexus

replies.body: The limit should a least be a good number, that is even as well, like 12 for example.
replies.body_tagged: The limit should a least be a good number, that is even as well, like 12 for example.

replies.body: 15 is way too high. 4 is a good number IMO.
replies.body_tagged: 15 is way too high. 4 is a good number IMO.

-1

I think the limit is perfect, wouldn't have to be some change.

replies.body:
Removing the player limit on nexus should be fine as it's just kills you're aiming for...
Gamemodes that have an objective like CTW or DTM where credit are obtained easily by avoiding players SHOULD have player limits.
